Verify the 'Submit' button is initially enabled with background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 500, border radius 4px, width 100px, height 40px, horizontal alignment to center, label 'Submit', and aria-label 'Submit form data'
Click the 'Submit' button
Verify 'Submit' button background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms, text color changes to #e0e0e0, gains 1px solid #004085 border, and opacity becomes 0.8

Confirm the product hero image has image source 'product_main.jpg', natural dimensions 1200x900px, rendered dimensions 600x450px, loads in less than 1.5s, displays alt text 'Premium Leather Boots', has 'Company Logo' watermark visible, x-position 50px, y-position 100px, and opacity 1
Focus the search input field

Verify search input field border changes from 1px solid #ccc to 2px solid #007bff, background color transitions from #fff to #f8f8ff, text color remains #333, text size is 16px, has placeholder 'Search products...', width 300px, height 36px, aria-label 'Search input', and padding 8px 12px
Hover over the navigation link 'About Us'

Confirm 'About Us' navigation link text color changes from #333 to #007bff, type weight changes from 400 to 600, an underline animation occurs over 150ms, has left alignment, inner spacing 10px 15px, vertical extent 40px, and text content 'About Us'
Play the video

Confirm video player is visible, not muted, not in fullscreen mode, width 720px, height 480px, media source 'video_intro.mp4', current time value > 00:00 after 1s, background color #000000, and opacity 1
Open the modal dialog
Verify modal dialog becomes visible with opacity 1
Confirm modal overlay background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Check modal content has width 500px, height 300px, is horizontally and vertically centered, has corner radius 8px, and 20px padding
Verify modal heading displays text 'Confirm Action' with font size 20px, transitioning opacity over 300ms
Load a page with 100 items
Confirm pagination controls display 10 page numbers, and each page number has padding 8px 12px
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled with color #007bff and font weight 500
Ensure the 'Previous' button is disabled with color #aaaaaa
Check current page '1' is active with background color #007bff and text color #ffffff

Confirm user profile avatar image source is 'user_avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 48x48px, shape is circular (border radius 50%), has 2px solid #ddd border, is loaded correctly, displays alt text 'User Profile Picture', has outer spacing (margin) 10px on its right side, and opacity 1
Submit an invalid form

Confirm error message element is visible, text content 'Please correct the highlighted fields.', text color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, font size 14px, padding 10px 15px, 1px solid #f5c6cb border, and top position 10px relative to the form
Verify content area initial scroll-top value was 0, width 800px, height 600px, border 1px solid #eee, background color #fafafa, and bottom margin 20px
Scroll the content area down by 500px
Verify scroll position (scroll-top) becomes 500px and scroll animation duration is 300ms
Select '2023-10-26' in the date picker input

Verify date picker input value changes to '2023-10-26', font size 16px, text color #333, placeholder 'Select a date', width 150px, associated element label 'Appointment Date', border 1px solid #ccc, and padding 5px
Receive a new notification

Confirm notification badge becomes visible with count 3, background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 10px, border radius 50%, padding 2px 6px, right position -5px relative to its parent icon, and top position -5px relative to its parent icon
Click the toggle switch to activate it

Verify toggle switch changes from disabled to enabled, background color transitions from #ccc to #28a745, opacity changes from 0.7 to 1, width 40px, height 20px, border radius 10px, associated label 'Enable Feature', and aria-label 'Toggle feature status'
Verify the table header 'Product Name' initial text color was #333 and font weight was 600
Hover over the table header 'Product Name'
Confirm table header background color changes to #f0f0f0, text color changes to #0056b3, padding 12px, text align left, width 200px, text content 'Product Name', and top margin 0
Advance the carousel slide
Confirm there are 4 carousel indicators
Verify active indicator has background color #007bff, width 20px, height 6px, and border radius 3px
Ensure inactive indicators have background color #ccc, width 10px, height 6px, and border radius 3px
Check indicator width and background color transition over 300ms, horizontal alignment is centered, and horizontal margin is 4px
Hover over an element to trigger a tooltip

Verify tooltip becomes visible with opacity 1, text content 'Additional info here', background color #333, text color #fff, font size 12px, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, top position 10px relative to the trigger, and opacity transitions over 150ms
Verify the link 'View Details' initial text decoration was 'underline'
Click the link 'View Details'

Verify 'View Details' link text color changes from #007bff to #800080, font weight changes to 600, target URL is 'https://example.com/details/123', font family 'Arial', 'sans-serif', padding 5px 0, and right margin 5px
Check header bar initial border bottom was 1px solid #eee
Scroll down the page such that scroll-top exceeds 100px

Verify header bar's height transitions from 80px to 60px over 200ms, background color changes from #fff to rgba(255,255,255,0.95), gains box-shadow '0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', and remains fixed at top 0, left 0, with width 100%
Click the checkbox 'Remember Me' to select it

Verify checkbox 'Remember Me' state changes from unchecked to checked, background color transitions from #fff to #007bff, border changes from 1px solid #ccc to 1px solid #007bff, width 18px, height 18px, associated label 'Remember Me', aria-label 'Keep me logged in', and margin-right 8px
Confirm progress bar initial width was 0% and it was hidden
Initiate data loading

Verify progress bar becomes visible with width 50%, background color #28a745, text '50% loaded', height 8px, border radius 4px, displays animation 'progress-pulse' for 2s infinite linear, top margin 10px, and opacity 1

Verify the 'Submit' button is enabled, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, border radius 4px, width 120px, height 40px, top margin 20px, padding 8px 16px, displays text 'Submit Application', and hover interaction triggers background color transition to #218838 over 150ms
Open 'https://demo.example.com/profile'

Confirm user profile image has source 'user_avatar.png', is loaded within 400ms, alt text 'User Avatar', rendered dimensions 100x100px, positioned at X-coordinate 20px Y-coordinate 80px, border 2px solid #ddd, shape is a circle (border radius 50%), opacity 1.0, top margin 10px, and left margin 10px
Open product detail page

Verify 'Product Description' heading uses font family 'Roboto', font size 24px, text color #333333, text alignment left, bottom margin 15px, width 90% of parent container, height auto, is visible, opacity 1.0, aria-label 'Product Details Section', and background color transparent
Navigate to checkout page

Confirm 'Shipping Address' input field is enabled, displays placeholder 'Enter full address', has border 1px solid #ced4da, font size 15px, font family 'Open Sans', current value is empty, padding 10px, width 300px, height 40px, and label 'Shipping Address'
Check 'Shipping Address' input field becomes focused when clicked

Verify navigation link 'Pricing' has text color #007bff, font weight 600, is not active, left margin 20px, right padding 15px, height 30px, width auto, is visible, and aria-label 'Navigate to pricing page'
Verify navigation link 'Pricing' has transition for text color lasting 200ms on hover to #0056b3
Click 'View Details'

Verify product description paragraph has line count ≥ 3, text color #666666, font size 14px, text alignment justified, top padding 10px, overall height 80px, width 300px, bottom margin 10px, uses font family 'Helvetica Neue', and opacity 0.9
Open the image gallery
